Infectra/Blizzard


Infectra: Yes, I like them....Why?

*Infectra asks Airb=
omber*



*Blizzard starts walking faster with Sinister*

  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, A=
ugust 04, 2000 5:54 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  "Maybe, who knows. We'll grow=
 old together. Do you like children?" Airbomber asked.

  "Yes! Let's go!" =
Sinister said. He started walking faster...
    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday,=
 August 04, 2000 5:45 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Blizzard/Infectra

    =
*Blizzard smiles*

    Blizzard: Okay, let's hurry so we don't miss anythin=
g else like maybe a nice battle.

    *Blizzard says to Sinister*



    *I=
nfectra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. She didn't think love could happen =
so sudden and fast*

    Infectra: There are probably tones of Maximals in =
there going on with lifes pretending we're not here.

    *infectra says an=
d than grins*

    Infectra: If we wait long enough then we'll get to play =
in the leaves and snow and than relax in the sun.

    *Infectra says jokin=
g wondering when someone will notice them*


      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday=
, August 04, 2000 4:48 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      "I don't know, let=
's go back there, now." Sinister said to Blizzard.

      Airbomber watched=
 Stranato running around and calling out. He laughed.

      "Stranato bett=
er get some help, otherwise be might become a 'heel' again." Airbomber said=
. He smiled and hugged Infectra, he never felt this way about a girl before=
....
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
 =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 A=
M
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



        *=
Twister looks at the sword and sighs*

        Twister: I'll have to get us=
ed to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to tra=
vel alone....

        *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the ene=
rgon eagles into her arm compartment*


        *Blizzard looks at Sinister=
 and smiles*

        Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.=




        *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

        Infectra: I trust =
the both of you......I did trust the others but....

        *Infectra sigh=
s*

        Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But,=
 it's hard to thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

    =
    *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


          ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
          Subject: Re: NBW


    =
      Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

          "He left t=
his here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wi=
sh I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

          Siniste=
r held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

       =
   Stranato calls out.

          "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells throug=
h the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

        =
  "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occuren=
ces happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn=
't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He lau=
ghed at his words...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent=
: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
            Subject: Re: NBW


       =
     Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



            *Twister looks at Sinesis*

 =
           Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister =
and I love her too much to pull her away from the she loves....

          =
  *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of en=
ergon both shaped like an eagle*

            Twister: Our parents gave us =
both one to unite us as sisters and friends forever and always help each ot=
her. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dro=
pped it by accident.....

            *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he c=
an see*



            (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sor=
ry.)

            *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Siniste=
r for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold =
her hand*



            *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the =
Maximal Base*


              ----- Original Message ----- 
              F=
rom: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thu=
rsday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


           =
   Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

           =
   Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

  =
            "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

       =
       Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were nev=
er set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
       =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, =
August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


                =
Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


                *Infectra follows Stranat=
o and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



                *Wrath gets in=
to a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



 =
               *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to S=
inister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to =
hold hands with him*



                (OOC: Twister is out near the Maxim=
al Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

                *Twister lea=
ves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where =
and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

=
                Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here=
 thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could=
 be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness co=
uld happen.....

                *Twister puts her double sided sword away =
stares at the table*


                  ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
              From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
              Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                  Sub=
ject: NBW


                  Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maxi=
mal base.

                  Gangon, still dying.

                  Deemos=
 and Inzola confront one another several times, but Inzola always runs from=
 Deemos.

                  Etchingar called out to Megatron.

            =
      "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

                  Time Bomb waite=
d patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking =
to meet Megatron.

                  Sinister came out of the cave (Hopeful=
ly with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

           =
       Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister...
